title: The Albuquerque Graveyard - description of woman

content.question: The description of the "woman" (line 40) most directly suggests that she

choices.label: gained renown for her knowledge of rhetoric
taught the speaker to suppress his sense of outrage
sought gratification through the speaker's possible success
drew on the speaker for her knowledge about the world

content.answer: sought gratification through the speaker's possible success

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
